title: IS_ALPHANUMERIC
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string contains only alphabetic characters (A-Z, a-z) or numeric digits (0-9); otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The text to evaluate for alphanumeric content.

examples:
IS_ALPHANUMERIC("Hello World")
-- Returns FALSE, as it contains a space

IS_ALPHANUMERIC("Hello123!")
-- Returns FALSE, as it contains punctuation

tips.text: Returns FALSE if the string is empty.
Any spaces, or symbols will result in FALSE.
